summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.8°C) and outside temperature (up 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1702 m) and inside temperature (up 2.2°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 115.7m lower than yesterday, 598.9m lower than the past week, 1702.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 713m and a high of 1594m, averaging 951.2m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather could become unsettled.
